timeline.body:
Change to
`verify(consumer, never()).enableConsumeAndStartLoop(any());`
or
`verify(consumer, times(1)).enableConsumeAndStartLoop(eq(State.BECOMING_LEADER));`
based on the logic you want to test
timeline.bodyHTML:
Change to
verify(consumer, never()).enableConsumeAndStartLoop(any());
or
verify(consumer, times(1)).enableConsumeAndStartLoop(eq(State.BECOMING_LEADER));
based on the logic you want to test
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.body: You should use `eq(State.LEADER)` instead of the direct value

timeline.body:
A method like `getOrCreate` should:
- prevent multiple initialization
- return the value

Please rename it to `initKafkaConsumer` if there is no check nor value to return :)
timeline.bodyText:
A method like getOrCreate should:

prevent multiple initialization
return the value

Please rename it to initKafkaConsumer if there is no check nor value to return :)
timeline.bodyHTML:
A method like getOrCreate should:

  • prevent multiple initialization
  • return the value

Please rename it to initKafkaConsumer if there is no check nor value to return :)
timeline.author: danielezonca
